We also have a problem with the fact that for long ended auctions there is still an opportunity to buy auction items.

If you, for your part, controlled the value of "postSaleDisabled" when calling itemsgetItemsInfo.api, taking into account all the dependent parameters, I think this would solve this issue. Or am I missing something?
Если бы вы со своей стороны управляли значением "postSaleDisabled" при вызове itemsgetItemsInfo.api с учётом всех зависимых параметров думаю это решило бы этот вопрос. Или я что то упустил?
And we check the possibility of selling lots after the end of the auctions by the "postSaleDisabled" parameter.
И возможность продажи лотов после завершения аукционов мы проверяем по параметру "postSaleDisabled".
I bought it today, provided that there is an option for auctions on the Bidspirit portal: "Days to allow post auction sale", which cannot be more than 14 days.
купил его сегодня при условии что для аукционов на портале Bidspirit есть опция: "Days to allow post auction sale", которая не может быть больше 14 дней.
We also have a problem with the fact that for long-ended auctions there is still an opportunity to buy auction items.
Так же у нас есть проблема с тем что для давно завершившихся аукционов остаётся возможность купить auction items.

In the description of the api call itemspostSalePurchase.api there is a moment that the user must be approved, and when trying to buy auction item, a user with an unconfirmed account gets an error, but the same user can buy a lot through itemsbuyout.api without any problems.

In the description of the api call itemspostSalePurchase.api there is a moment that the user must be approved, and when trying to buy lot, a user with an unconfirmed account gets an error, but the same user can buy a lot through itemsbuyout.api without any problems.

I supplemented the calculation of interest with updated API call getHouseInfo(). In the description of the api call itemspostSalePurchase there is a moment that the user must be approved, and when trying to buy a lot, a user with an unconfirmed account gets an error, but the same user can buy a lot through itemsbuyout.api without any problems.
Is this how it should be?

Я дополнил расчёт процентов с обновлёнными API call getHouseInfo(). В описании к api call itemspostSalePurchase есть момент что пользователь должен быть approved, и при попытке купить лот пользователь с не подтверждённым аккаунтом получает ошибку, но этот же пользователь без проблем может купить лот через itemsbuyout.api. Это так и должно быть?
Users from foreign countries may be exempted from tax payments, according to the relevant tax regulations

Please note that Your website is based on the bidspirit basic template. If you would like, we can upgrade your website and add more pagessectionscontent for an additional payment based on hour bank. If you would like to get more information about the options, please write here in this WhatsApp group, or send us an email to support@bidspirit-themes.com, and we will send examples.

When you publish auctions in bidspirit admin, they will be synced to your website automatically. The sync takes place every hour. Any change to the cataloglots should be done directly in the bidspirit admin and not in your website WordPress admin. Content pages – about us, contact us, etc. It is effortless to make changes on your website using the WordPress admin.
